title: Delhi Capitals Dominate UP Warriorz in WPL 2024: Lanning & Verma Power Nine-Wicket Win
content:
The Delhi Capitals made a statement in their first WPL 2024 victory, dismantling the UP Warriorz by a resounding nine wickets.  Meg Lanning and Shafali Verma orchestrated a dominant chase, smashing a 119-run partnership to secure the win in just 14.3 overs. 

Earlier, a brilliant bowling performance by Marizanne Kapp and Radha Yadav set the stage for the Capitals' triumph. Kapp's fiery spell, including three wickets in her first four overs, stifled the Warriorz's early momentum. Yadav then took over, claiming four wickets, including crucial dismissals of Grace Harris and Kiran Navgire, effectively dismantling the Warriorz's middle order. 

The victory showcased the Capitals' depth and firepower, highlighting the importance of a strong bowling attack and a formidable opening partnership in T20 cricket.
author: Scroll Staff
